tours.title: HoChiMinh City Hop On – Hop Off Bus (Valid 24 hours)

tours.description: Day 1 + Day 2: Ticket for 48 hours Ho Chi Minh City bus tour audio guide with 07 languages. Day 3: Full day Mekong Delta Tour. Day 4: Half day Cu Chi Tunnels Tour.

tours.description: 1 round trip last for 45 minutes cover all the best of center of Ho Chi Minh City on a double decker bus. Explore the city on open-top buses with free WiFi on-board. Audio commentary available

tours.title: Cu Chi Tunnels (GUIDE INCLUDED)
tours.title_vn: Địa Đạo Củ Chi (Có Hướng Dẫn Viên)
tours.description: Cu Chi Tunnels is a legendary tunnel system with more than 220 km of tunnels, a must-see attraction for both Vietnamese and foreign tourists who are interested in the history of the Vietnam War

tours.title: 1h around Saigon +Saigon Skydeck

tours.title: 1 trip around Saigon and Dinner on Cruise
tours.title_vn: Saigon City Tour + Ăn tối trên tàu Indochina Queen
tours.description: Sightseeing Saigon on a double decker bus. Dinner is served on the cruise and see the illuminated landscapes along the Saigon River. Enjoy a delicious traditional Vietnamese menu. Live music

tours.title: Independence Palace + Ho Chi Minh City 1 round trip
